achievements: Started as an intern for 7 months and got a full-time role afterward. One of my achievements is the #AfricaVsVirus Challenge Top 20 Award I received for contributing to ACADASUITE School Management Software, demonstrating excellence in software development and innovation.

One of the achievements I am proud of is I implemented and managed Alluvium University's Learning Management System using Moodle, showcasing proficiency in LMS, and learning new technologies quickly. I Collaborated with UI/UX designers to solve user experience problems, leveraging skills in critical thinking, problem-solving, and creativity.
